webscript.description: Example : curl -uadmin:admin -d '{"coreClient":"search.alfrescoCoreSolrBackupClient", "location":"/tmp"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/contentreich/misc/backup-index Valid core clients are : search.alfrescoCoreSolrBackupClient and search.archiveCoreSolrBackupClient
